00049 //
00050 // WeightedAndNode
00051 //
00052 // 26 January 2004 - tds
00053 //
00054 
00055 #ifndef INDRI_WEIGHTEDANDNODE_HPP
00056 #define INDRI_WEIGHTEDANDNODE_HPP
00057 
00058 #include <vector>
00059 #include "indri/BeliefNode.hpp"
00060 #include "indri/SkippingCapableNode.hpp"
00061 #include "indri/ScoredExtentResult.hpp"
00062 #include <math.h>
00063 
00064 class WeightedAndNode : public SkippingCapableNode {
00065 private:
00066   struct child_type {
00067     struct maxscore_less {
00068     public:
00069       bool operator () ( const child_type& one, const child_type& two ) const {
00070         // think of these two elements as the only two elements in the
00071         // #wand.  What is the threshold of each ordering?  Sort by
00072         // the lowest threshold.
00073 
00074         return (one.backgroundWeightedScore + two.maximumWeightedScore) > 
00075                (one.maximumWeightedScore + two.backgroundWeightedScore);
00076       }
00077     };
00078 
00079     BeliefNode* node;
00080     double weight;
00081     double maximumWeightedScore;
00082     double backgroundWeightedScore;
00083   };
00084 
00085   std::vector<child_type> _children;
00086   greedy_vector<ScoredExtentResult> _scores;
00087   std::string _name;
00088 
00089   greedy_vector<int> _candidates;
00090   int _candidatesIndex;
00091 
00092   double _threshold;
00093   double _recomputeThreshold;
00094   int _quorumIndex;
00095   void _computeQuorum();
00096   double _computeMaxScore( unsigned int start );
00097 
00098 public:
00099   WeightedAndNode( const std::string& name ) : _name(name), _threshold(-DBL_MAX), _quorumIndex(0), _recomputeThreshold(-DBL_MAX) {}
00100 
00101   void addChild( double weight, BeliefNode* node );
00102   void doneAddingChildren();
00103 
00104   // SkippingCapableNode
00105   void setThreshold( double threshold );
00106 
00107   // InferenceNetworkNode interface
00108   int nextCandidateDocument();
00109   double maximumScore();
00110   double maximumBackgroundScore();
00111   greedy_vector<ScoredExtentResult>& score( int documentID, int begin, int end, int documentLength );
00112   void annotate( class Annotator& annotator, int documentID, int begin, int end );
00113   bool hasMatch( int documentID );
00114   const std::string& getName() const;
00115 };
00116 
00117 #endif // INDRI_WEIGHTEDANDNODE_HPP
